# Alarm, Greater (Spell)

[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]
**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]], [[2nd Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 2]]
**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]
**Casting Time:** 1 standard action
**Components:** V, S, F (a bell made of carved crystal, worth at least 100 gp)
**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
**Area:** 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
**Duration:** 4 hours/level (D)
**Saving Throw:** None
**Spell Resistance:** No
**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 8

*Uttering a low chant, you ring a crystal bell with the drumming of your fingernails, bringing into being an invisible warded area.*

This spell functions like *[[Alarm (Spell)|alarm]]*, and in addition the spell works on creatures traveling through the area on coterminous or coexistent planes, such the [[Ethereal Plane]] and the Plane of Shadow.

**GM NOTE**

*House Rule:* Added Wu jen 2 to Level per Complete Arcane (after adjusting to match the Sorcerer/Wizard version).
